title: Landlords to carry out 'Right to rent' checks (DNCC - Derbyshire & Nottinghamshire Chamber of ...
text: ( Source : DNCC - Derbyshire & Nottinghamshire Chamber of Commerce ) Posted on October 20th , 2015 The Government has announced today that from 1 February 2016 all private landlords in England will have to check new tenants have the right
